# Binomial distribution

$$p(0, N) = (1 - p)^N$$

_Step 1:_ Specify *p* and *N*
*p* = 0.1
*N* = 7

_Step 2:_ Find *p*(*k,N*) from equation 3.47
*p*(0,*N*) = (1-0.1)^7 = (0.9)^7 = 0.47

_Step 3_: Find *p*(*k,N*) from equation 3.48 (I will use dbinom... :) )
```{r}
k <- c(1:7) 
k <- as.data.frame(k)

results <- as.data.frame(apply(k, 2, dbinom, size=7, prob=0.1)) %>% select(p=k) %>% cbind(k) %>% select(k,p)
```
